page.title: 14News 1985
page.content: During the time of the miner's strike a striking miner decided to go to work.Mr Williams was escorted to work by police.Three miners were waiting on the Rhymney Road Bridge.Two of the miners,Russel Shankland and Dean Hancock dropped a concrete block on the taxi killing the driver Mr David Wilkie of Cardiff.In the trial at Cardiff the two miners were found guilty of murder and sentenced to life imprisonment. A T.W.A.Airliner took off from Athens airport and was hijacked by Shiite Moslems.A Rhymney woman Betty Howe was an airhostess on board.She was released and returned home from Beirut.At the time an American Navy Diver on the plane was shot by the terrorists.
